wikipedia_page.main: James Christopher Harrington (25 December 1896 – 6 May 1978) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Liverpool, Wigan Borough, Southport and Crewe Alexandra. He later moved to America to play for New York Giants.

response: * Chris Harrington (American football) (born 1985), American football player
* Chris Harrington (ice hockey) (born 1982), ice hockey player
* Chris Harrington (Home and Away), a fictional character in the Australian soap opera Home and Away
